Definition: In this task, you have to answer questions that involve understanding time durations. Some context will be provided, followed by a question that requires a common understanding of the time spent on certain tasks. For example, the context might be: "We are working on your coffee. I will bring it when it is ready." The question could be: "How long does the person have to wait for the coffee?" with the following options: ["5 minutes", "1 year", "30 minutes", "10 seconds"]. Give all the plausible answers such as: "5 minutes", "30 minutes", "10 seconds".

Positive Examples.input:
Context: China has been a great help at getting North Korea to the table and Bush is hoping that with their cooperation Korea can become a nuclear free peninsula . 
Question: How long does it take for Korea to become a nuclear free peninsula? 
Options: ["several days", "for years", "several years", "4 hours"]
Positive Examples.explanation: Being nuclear free for a country takes some time because they have to pass some laws.
